title: Qian Qing Ren Bu Zhi
overview: Zheng Ding Ding and Chen Xun have been a couple for many years. Ding Ding always puts her boyfriend first and even put her dream of designing pet toys aside for him. But when she realizes that Chen Xun still hasn't forgotten his ex-girlfriend, she decides to finally put an end to this toxic relationship. Veterinarian Ning Wei Jin then encourages her to pursue her dream.
